attributes.name: Bound Battleaxe
attributes.description: Creates a magic battle axe for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

attributes.name: Bound Bow
attributes.description: Equips an ethereal Daedric Bow and 100 ethereal Daedric Arrows for 120 seconds.

attributes.name: Bound Dagger
attributes.description: Creates a magic dagger for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

attributes.name: Bound Sword
attributes.description: Creates a magic sword for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
